custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Biotech & Pharma Contract Employment Agency

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]Temporary professionals for assignments as required to complete projects and meet your specific business needs. Eliminate costly downtime and meet critical deadlines. Maintain adequate staff levels to provide seamless service and optimal results.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#e9edee” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Contract-to-Permanent

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]Reduce the risks of filling permanent roles. Work with, evaluate and assess candidates before you extend an offer. Employees stay on our payroll until you’re sure they’re the right fit for your company and its culture.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#e9edee” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Billing Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]If you find it increasingly difficult to maintain working capital for payroll purposes, ClinLab can help. We provide immediate access to critical funds, turning AR and other assets into capital you can use to keep your business on track.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#e9edee” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″ disabled_on=”off|on|on”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”75px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Access top talent on your terms

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”19px” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”8px||25px||false|false” meta._et_pb_old_content:
Biotech & Pharma Contract Employment Agency

Temporary professionals for assignments as required to complete projects and meet your specific business needs. Eliminate costly downtime and meet critical deadlines. Maintain adequate staff levels to provide seamless service and optimal results.

Contract-to-Permanent

Reduce the risks of filling permanent roles. Work with, evaluate and assess candidates before you extend an offer. Employees stay on our payroll until you’re sure they’re the right fit for your company and its culture.

Billing Services

If you find it increasingly difficult to maintain working capital for payroll purposes, ClinLab can help. We provide immediate access to critical funds, turning AR and other assets into capital you can use to keep your business on track.

Access top talent on your terms

ClinLab understands the needs of your business, so we can make the best talent match to meet your contract and permanent placement requirements.

  • Access skilled science professionals who make a positive impact on outcomes, starting on day one
  • Supplement your staff with carefully prescreened and qualified  candidates
  • Shorten time to procure difficult-to-find skill sets
  • Relieve the administrative burdens of being an employer

Get Started!

[gravityform id="1" name="Contact Us" title="false" description="false"]
